name: WhiteNoises
0:
”Alexa, open white noises”
”Alexa, launch white noises”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: white noises
Developer Terms of Use
des:
White Noises lets you hear white noise that can help you stay focused, relax and falling asleep.

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

1. Enable this Alexa skill.
2. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
3. Click + to add a new routine.
4. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
5. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
6. Choose "Your Skills".
7. Select this skill.
8. Click Next.
9. Choose Device to perform the routine to.
10. Click Save.

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/smartskills.it
